name: SKUZZLE a Game Designer student personal project
name_original: SKUZZLE a Game Designer student personal project
description:
PITCH : 
SKUZZLE is a puzzle game with a lot of 80's colors !
We play as a small ball, that has the power to change the gravity and to walk on the walls in order to collect some shinny stars !

DETAILS:
Developer : Steven ZAMEL (Game Designer Student)
 Release : June 2019
Game plateform : PC
Genre : Puzzle
Language : English (menus)
Game with text
PEGI 7 (not officially rated)

CREDITS:
-Steven ZAMEL-
Game Design
 Game Art
 Project management
